snippet: ROSEN--Walter. Friends for over 50 years. Love to Sandye, Brett and Debbie, Kevin, Alan and Leslie and to all the grandchildren. He will be missed - rest in peace dear friend. Ashley, Harriet and all the Hoffmans 1/3
